diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Familial idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis associated with a TERT mutation
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient had a history of idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis diagnosed at age 49, family history of pulmonary fibrosis, and severe restrictive ventilatory defect observed on pulmonary-function testing. Gene sequencing confirmed a heterozygous mutation in TERT that is associated with telomerase dysfunction.
